thread.title: Vandy's chance to give Mason first SEC win slips away
thread.title_full: Vandy's chance to give Mason first SEC win slips away

title: Vandy's chance to give Mason first SEC win slips away
text: Vandy's chance to give Mason first SEC win slips away David Ammenheuser , dammenheus@tennessean.com 9:51 p.m. CDT October 17, 2015 South Carolina interim head coach Shawn Elliott is doused after the Gamecocks beat Vanderbilt 19-10 on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP Vanderbilt center Jake Bernstein (53) tries to stop South Carolina linebacker Skai Moore (10) after his interception return during the second half. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina wide receiver D.J. Neal (3) is brought down by Vanderbilt cornerback Torren McGaster (5) on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports Vanderbilt wide receiver Trent Sherfield (10) loses the ball as South Carolina cornerback Al Harris Jr. (7) breaks up the pass during the second half on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina linebacker Bryson Allen-Williams (4) intercepts a pass and is tackled by Vanderbilt receiver Darrius Sims (6) during the second half on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina's Terry Googer is tackled by Vanderbilt's Tre Herndon after making a catch for a first down during the second half on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP South Carolina's D.J. Neal, right, has a pass in the end zone broken up by Vanderbilt's Ryan White during the second half on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP South Carolina's Chris Lammons (3) intercepts a pass intended for Vanderbilt's Trey Ellis during the second half on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP Vanderbilt's Caleb Scott pulls in a reception for a touchdown during the second quarter against South Carolina on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP South Carolina interim coach Shawn Elliott cheers during the second quarter against Vanderbilt on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina running back David Williams (33) goes around the end during the second quarter on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina linebacker T.J. Holloman (11) hits Vanderbilt tight end Nathan Marcus (83) during the second quarter on Oct. 17, 2015. Holloman was ejected for targeting. Jim Dedmon, Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports Vanderbilt quarterback Johnny McCrary (2) runs out of the pocket chased by South Carolina defensive end Boosie Whitlow (49) during the second quarter on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports Vanderbilt tight end Nathan Marcus (83) makes a catch just as South Carolina linebacker Skai Moore (10) comes in for the stop during the second quarter on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina defensive end Marquavius Lewis (8) pressures Vanderbilt quarterback Johnny McCrary (2) during the second quarter on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina safety T.J. Gurley (20) chases down Vanderbilt wide receiver Trent Sherfield (10) on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports Vanderbilt quarterback Johnny McCrary is sacked by South Carolina's Taylor Stallworth (90) and Skai Moore during the first half on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP South Carolina's T.J. Holloman (11) recovers a fumble during the first half against Vanderbilt on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP Vanderbilt defensive tackle Jay Woods (74) reaches for South Carolina running back Brandon Wilds (22) on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports Vanderbilt quarterback Johnny McCrary (2) makes a throw during the first quarter at South Carolina on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports A Vanderbilt cheerleader performs during the first half on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP Vanderbilt wide receiver Darrius Sims (6) runs the ball during the first quarter at South Carolina on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina quarterback Perry Orth (10) throws during the first quarter against Vanderbilt on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina interim head coach Shawn Elliott gets his team fired up before the game with Vanderbilt on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP South Carolina Gamecocks interim head coach Shawn Elliott before the game against Vanderbilt on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina interim head coach Shawn Elliott, left, talks with Vanderbilt coach Derek Mason before the start of the game on Oct. 17, 2015. Richard Shiro, AP Vanderbilt fans cheer their team as the buses pass by before the game with South Carolina on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina interim head coach Shawn Elliott high fives fans during the Gamecock Walk before the game with Vanderbilt on Oct. 17, 2015. Jim Dedmon-USA TODAY Sports South Carolina interim head coach Shawn Elliott high fives fans during the Gamecock Walk before the game with Vanderbilt on Oct. 17, 2015.
